author: Amrith Ramkumar
title: Stocks to Watch: CBS, Twitter, Tesla, Nike, Berkshire, Newell, Activision Blizzard, Celgene, Pandora, GoPro
text: Here are some of the companies with shares expected to trade actively in Friday’s session. Stock movements reflect premarket trading. —Up 2.8%: The broadcast company exceeded quarterly profit and revenue expectations in the most recent quarter. —Down 1.2%: Twitter said it uncovered a glitch in how its users’ passwords were stored.
